The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 February is 3,358,064 (5,966 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 27 January, there were 165,596 new confirmed cases (294.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 January, there were 237,765 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (72,169 fewer cases).
